title: Teeny Tiny Trains (by Short Circuit Studio)
author: mfcgames
excerpt: Hello, dear Touch Arcade community! Following the warm reception of "Teeny Tiny Town" and "Tiny Connections," we at Short Circuit Studio are beyond...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Hello, dear Touch Arcade community! Following the warm reception of "Teeny Tiny Town" and "Tiny Connections," we at Short Circuit Studio are beyond excited to introduce you to our latest creation, "Teeny Tiny Trains." Prepare yourselves for an enthralling journey where you'll step into the shoes of a masterful train conductor, orchestrating a miniature railway empire with strategic finesse and puzzle-solving savvy. About the Game: This isn't just a game about connecting points A and B; it's about the journey, the strategy, and the creativity involved in overcoming each new challenge. As the game progresses, you'll face obstacles that threaten to derail your plans. It's up to us to keep everything on track, proving our strategic genius and ensuring the smooth operation of our railway empire. Our Game's Key Features: -Unleash Your Creativity: With our "level editor," we're handing over the reins for you to design and share your very own levels. -Complex Puzzles: Engage with puzzles that increase in complexity, keeping the game fresh and engaging. -Expand Your Empire: As we master levels and unlock new track elements, our railway empire will grow more vast and intricate. -Achievements: There's a rich array of achievements to earn, recognizing both our small victories and major triumphs. -Aural and Visual Pleasure: We've carefully crafted the game with relaxing music, ambient sounds, and stunning visuals to enhance your gameplay experience. We’d love you to try it out and let us know what you think! Choo-Choo! Link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/teeny-tiny-trains/id6476918116 Teeny Tiny Trains Welcome aboard Teeny Tiny Trains, where you're the conductor of your very own miniature railway empire! This game is you… DetailsWelcome aboard Teeny Tiny Trains, where you're the conductor of your very own miniature railway empire! This game is your ticket to becoming a master of the tracks, blending strategy and puzzle-solving into a locomotive adventure. Your mission is to strategically place tracks on the board, connecting them to guide your tiny trains from one station to the next. Starting with simple rail pieces, you'll engineer a network that's both functional and fantastic, steering through challenges and chugging towards success. As your tiny trains go full steam ahead, you'll navigate through puzzles that demand you to think like a true track star. Each level is a new station on your journey, offering unique challenges that will test your wit and wisdom on the rails. But beware, it's not all smooth sailing or, should we say, smooth railing. Obstacles will try to derail your plans, and it's up to you to keep things on track. As you advance, you'll unlock new pieces of the puzzle, expanding your railway empire and proving that you're no one-track mind. Key Features: - Unleash your creativity with the ability to design and share your own levels with our "level editor" - Engaging puzzles with increasing complexity to keep you hooked. - Expand your railway by mastering levels and unlocking new track elements. - Achievements. - Relaxing music, ambient sounds and stunning game art. All aboard for a puzzle game that's just the ticket! Seller:Short Circuit Studio TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal The wooden toys aesthetic is adorable! (⁠ ⁠ꈍ⁠ᴗ⁠ꈍ⁠)~♡ Made it to 01L28. Pretty good start to get the hang of gameplay. Now I need to sleep because it's 4:28 a. m. ༼⁠;⁠´⁠༎ຶ⁠ ⁠۝ ⁠༎ຶ⁠༽ This was an instabuy for me. You had me at "level editor" (although I can't edit but love to play others levels). A couple of notes. It would be nice to have re-start option for the level. And sometimes the swipe is not intuitive. Otherwise another great one. So is it kind of like Railbound? Staff Member Patreon Bronze Can we get an undo option that resets our last move? Great game!!I agree that the swipe inputs could use some tweaking. To “restart” the level, you can tap the red trash can in the lower-left, then select the it again when the menu opens. That removes all the track that you’ve laid down. Thanks for the input we are looking into tweaking it so it feels more "smooth". I am writing down everything to the team so we will get started with all the requested features for the next big update! It's our take on a trains puzzle game. But you could say it has similarities with Railbound and Trainyard to mention a few You had me at Trainyard (and because it’s you lot). Can’t find no gameplay videos but is this like an old puzzle game I used to play called RGB express? Not sure haven’t heard about this one before. Need to look it up It certainly has some similarities to RGBE. High praise; it’s an awesome little game. Thank you! We are bringing the some improvements to the drawing, an undo last track buttons and some more minor tweaks here and there in the beginning of the next week. We have some awesome feature coming up as well as more chapters, mechanics, levels etc. New Patch 1.0.3 is submitted! The following is added to the game: Undo feature, undo your drawing or erasing. The game store the history of everything you draw or erase. Improvements to drawing and visualisation Some other minor bug fixes. Now we are full steam ahead working on more content and feature as well as improvements to the community section of the game. Hot off the press! A Teeny Tiny Trains update is chugging it's way over to you! This update introduces a fresh method for track placement in the game. Players now have the option to toggle between the existing Draw mode and the newly implemented Placement mode via the game settings. Enhancements have also been made to the community section to improve user experience. Additionally, we have fixed a previously reported problem with the Restore Purchase button, which should now function correctly. Other fixes include: You should now be able to get gold on all levels Issues with tracks resolved that trains sometimes derails 5th Community map slot! You will have the ability like or dislike a community level after beating them in the win screen Keep a look out for another important surprise update next week Hello Train lovers! As of yesterday, our new Teeny Tiny Trains patch went live across all devices! In this patch you can expect; Train Collection: Embark on an epic journey with our latest addition: trains! Unlock, unbox, and equip one of the seven new trains. Can you collect them all? Master Track Levels: Brace yourselves for even more challenges! Each chapter now boasts an additional five levels, bringing a total of 25 thrilling new levels to conquer. It's practically like diving into a brand-new chapter! Editor Updates: Dive deeper into creativity with enhanced editor features! Experience smoother item placement on the board for improved Quality of Life (QoL). Plus, save your track changes seamlessly within the editor. Community Section Updates: Navigating the community section has never been easier! Discover several quality-of-life improvements including a convenient refresh button and multiple filters. Get ready to explore with newfound ease! Achievements: Celebrate your victories in-game with our latest addition: achievement tracking! Plus, challenge yourself with nine exciting new achievements to unlock. A Good Bug is a Dead Bug: We've gone on a bug-squashing spree! Experience smoother gameplay with several pesky bugs eradicated for a more seamless experience. Let us know what you think and as always what you'd like to see in future patches! Let us know what you think and as always what you'd like to see in future patches! The New Teeny Tiny Trains Patch is Live! We’re thrilled to announce our new patch update with exciting features and improvements. Here's the highlights: Chapter 6 Unfolds - The mysteries of the Treehouse beckon with complex new levels that challenge your strategic mind. As well as this, new Track Master Challenges await with it! 5 New Achievements UI Adjustments for Level Editor - We’ve fine-tuned the UI for the level editor to avoid issues on specific devices, ensuring a smoother experience. Immersive Gameplay - New gameplay mechanics including "Accelerator" and "Decelerator" offer unique challenges and dynamic interactions, transforming play. The new gameplay mechanics come with a comprehensive tutorial. Expanded Community Area - Craft and share maps with new freedoms and filters! New Train Incoming - A new train joins the fleet, meticulously crafted for collectors with a passion for aesthetics. Bug Fixes Fixed a bug with tunnels. Improved collision mechanics for more realistic interactions. This is live across both iOS & Android - we can't wait to see what you think! Teeny Tiny Trains: Full Steam Ahead to Savings — Summer Sale This Weekend Only! ☀️ Hop aboard the deal train! This weekend, Teeny Tiny Trains is chugging into a discount station near you This is live across both iOS & Android! Welcome to the latest "Retro Arcade on Rails" patch for Teeny Tiny Trains! This update brings exciting enhancements and new features to the game; - Speed Slider now ranges from 0-10 (So you can finally pause ) - Fixed top-down camera view issues. - Updated community section with more map details. - Launched Traincade with unlockable minigames. - New unlockable trains via Traincade. - Improved train collision handling. - New achievements. - Now offering unlimited slots for community levels. Live across iOS - Android is pending review still and should hopefully follow shortly! The Teeny Tiny Trains Chapter 7 Update is Live! We're excited to announce that Chapter 7 is now available across all devices! Here's what's new in this update: - Family Porch: Explore a peaceful new location inspired by late summer evenings, complete with mastery levels. - New Splitter Mechanic: Master the new splitter feature where one train enters and two emerge. - New addition to the train collection: Featuring Timmy's latest homemade train creation. - New Traincade Game: Oh yes the Train-themed arcade games continue. Go hunting for the new game's disc! Update now to experience these exciting new features and continue your journey in Teeny Tiny Trains! Share This Page
html:
1. Hello, dear Touch Arcade community! Following the warm reception of "Teeny Tiny Town" and "Tiny Connections," we at Short Circuit Studio are beyond excited to introduce you to our latest creation, "Teeny Tiny Trains." Prepare yourselves for an enthralling journey where you'll step into the shoes of a masterful train conductor, orchestrating a miniature railway empire with strategic finesse and puzzle-solving savvy.

    About the Game:

    This isn't just a game about connecting points A and B; it's about the journey, the strategy, and the creativity involved in overcoming each new challenge. As the game progresses, you'll face obstacles that threaten to derail your plans. It's up to us to keep everything on track, proving our strategic genius and ensuring the smooth operation of our railway empire.

    Our Game's Key Features:

    -Unleash Your Creativity: With our "level editor," we're handing over the reins for you to design and share your very own levels.
    -Complex Puzzles: Engage with puzzles that increase in complexity, keeping the game fresh and engaging.
    -Expand Your Empire: As we master levels and unlock new track elements, our railway empire will grow more vast and intricate.
    -Achievements: There's a rich array of achievements to earn, recognizing both our small victories and major triumphs.
    -Aural and Visual Pleasure: We've carefully crafted the game with relaxing music, ambient sounds, and stunning visuals to enhance your gameplay experience.

    We’d love you to try it out and let us know what you think!

    Choo-Choo!

    Link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/teeny-tiny-trains/id6476918116

    Teeny Tiny Trains

    Welcome aboard Teeny Tiny Trains, where you're the conductor of your very own miniature railway empire! This game is you…
    Details
    Welcome aboard Teeny Tiny Trains, where you're the conductor of your very own miniature railway empire! This game is your ticket to becoming a master of the tracks, blending strategy and puzzle-solving into a locomotive adventure. Your mission is to strategically place tracks on the board, connecting them to guide your tiny trains from one station to the next. Starting with simple rail pieces, you'll engineer a network that's both functional and fantastic, steering through challenges and chugging towards success. As your tiny trains go full steam ahead, you'll navigate through puzzles that demand you to think like a true track star. Each level is a new station on your journey, offering unique challenges that will test your wit and wisdom on the rails. But beware, it's not all smooth sailing or, should we say, smooth railing. Obstacles will try to derail your plans, and it's up to you to keep things on track. As you advance, you'll unlock new pieces of the puzzle, expanding your railway empire and proving that you're no one-track mind. Key Features: - Unleash your creativity with the ability to design and share your own levels with our "level editor" - Engaging puzzles with increasing complexity to keep you hooked. - Expand your railway by mastering levels and unlocking new track elements. - Achievements. - Relaxing music, ambient sounds and stunning game art. All aboard for a puzzle game that's just the ticket!
    Seller:Short Circuit Studio
    TouchArcade Rating:Unrated
    Compatibility:HD Universal

  2. The wooden toys aesthetic is adorable!
    (⁠ ⁠ꈍ⁠ᴗ⁠ꈍ⁠)~♡

    Made it to 01L28. Pretty good start to get the hang of gameplay. Now I need to sleep because it's 4:28 a. m.

    ༼⁠;⁠´⁠༎ຶ⁠ ⁠۝ ⁠༎ຶ⁠༽

  4. This was an instabuy for me. You had me at "level editor" (although I can't edit but love to play others levels). A couple of notes. It would be nice to have re-start option for the level. And sometimes the swipe is not intuitive. Otherwise another great one.
  5. So is it kind of like Railbound?

  6. Staff Member Patreon Bronze

    Can we get an undo option that resets our last move? Great game!!I agree that the swipe inputs could use some tweaking.

    To “restart” the level, you can tap the red trash can in the lower-left, then select the it again when the menu opens. That removes all the track that you’ve laid down.

  7. Thanks for the input we are looking into tweaking it so it feels more "smooth". I am writing down everything to the team so we will get started with all the requested features for the next big update!
  8. It's our take on a trains puzzle game. But you could say it has similarities with Railbound and Trainyard to mention a few
  9. You had me at Trainyard (and because it’s you lot).
  10. Can’t find no gameplay videos but is this like an old puzzle game I used to play called RGB express?
  11. Not sure haven’t heard about this one before. Need to look it up
  12. It certainly has some similarities to RGBE. High praise; it’s an awesome little game.
  13. Thank you!

    We are bringing the some improvements to the drawing, an undo last track buttons and some more minor tweaks here and there in the beginning of the next week.

    We have some awesome feature coming up as well as more chapters, mechanics, levels etc.

  14. New Patch 1.0.3 is submitted! The following is added to the game:

    Undo feature, undo your drawing or erasing. The game store the history of everything you draw or erase.
    Improvements to drawing and visualisation
    Some other minor bug fixes.

    Now we are full steam ahead working on more content and feature as well as improvements to the community section of the game.

  15. Hot off the press! A Teeny Tiny Trains update is chugging it's way over to you!

    This update introduces a fresh method for track placement in the game. Players now have the option to toggle between the existing Draw mode and the newly implemented Placement mode via the game settings. Enhancements have also been made to the community section to improve user experience. Additionally, we have fixed a previously reported problem with the Restore Purchase button, which should now function correctly.

    Other fixes include:

    • You should now be able to get gold on all levels
    • Issues with tracks resolved that trains sometimes derails
    • 5th Community map slot!
    • You will have the ability like or dislike a community level after beating them in the win screen

    Keep a look out for another important surprise update next week
  16. Hello Train lovers!

    As of yesterday, our new Teeny Tiny Trains patch went live across all devices!

    In this patch you can expect;

    Train Collection:

    Embark on an epic journey with our latest addition: trains! Unlock, unbox, and equip one of the seven new trains. Can you collect them all?

    Master Track Levels:

     Brace yourselves for even more challenges! Each chapter now boasts an additional five levels, bringing a total of 25 thrilling new levels to conquer. It's practically like diving into a brand-new chapter!

    Editor Updates:

     Dive deeper into creativity with enhanced editor features! Experience smoother item placement on the board for improved Quality of Life (QoL). Plus, save your track changes seamlessly within the editor.

    Community Section Updates:

     Navigating the community section has never been easier! Discover several quality-of-life improvements including a convenient refresh button and multiple filters. Get ready to explore with newfound ease!

    Achievements:

     Celebrate your victories in-game with our latest addition: achievement tracking! Plus, challenge yourself with nine exciting new achievements to unlock.

    A Good Bug is a Dead Bug:

     We've gone on a bug-squashing spree! Experience smoother gameplay with several pesky bugs eradicated for a more seamless experience. Let us know what you think and as always what you'd like to see in future patches!

    Let us know what you think and as always what you'd like to see in future patches!

  17. The New Teeny Tiny Trains Patch is Live!

    We’re thrilled to announce our new patch update with exciting features and improvements.
    Here's the highlights:

    • Chapter 6 Unfolds - The mysteries of the Treehouse beckon with complex new levels that challenge your strategic mind. As well as this, new Track Master Challenges await with it!
    • 5 New Achievements
    • UI Adjustments for Level Editor - We’ve fine-tuned the UI for the level editor to avoid issues on specific devices, ensuring a smoother experience.
    • Immersive Gameplay - New gameplay mechanics including "Accelerator" and "Decelerator" offer unique challenges and dynamic interactions, transforming play. The new gameplay mechanics come with a comprehensive tutorial.
    • Expanded Community Area - Craft and share maps with new freedoms and filters!
    • New Train Incoming - A new train joins the fleet, meticulously crafted for collectors with a passion for aesthetics.

    Bug Fixes
    • Fixed a bug with tunnels.
    • Improved collision mechanics for more realistic interactions.

    This is live across both iOS & Android - we can't wait to see what you think!
  18. Teeny Tiny Trains: Full Steam Ahead to Savings — Summer Sale This Weekend Only! ☀️

    Hop aboard the deal train! This weekend, Teeny Tiny Trains is chugging into a discount station near you

    This is live across both iOS & Android!


  19. Welcome to the latest "Retro Arcade on Rails" patch for Teeny Tiny Trains!

    This update brings exciting enhancements and new features to the game;

    - Speed Slider now ranges from 0-10 (So you can finally pause )
    - Fixed top-down camera view issues.
    - Updated community section with more map details.
    - Launched Traincade with unlockable minigames.
    - New unlockable trains via Traincade.
    - Improved train collision handling.
    - New achievements.
    - Now offering unlimited slots for community levels.

    Live across iOS - Android is pending review still and should hopefully follow shortly!

  20. The Teeny Tiny Trains Chapter 7 Update is Live!

    We're excited to announce that Chapter 7 is now available across all devices!

    Here's what's new in this update:

    - Family Porch: Explore a peaceful new location inspired by late summer evenings, complete with mastery levels.

    - New Splitter Mechanic: Master the new splitter feature where one train enters and two emerge.

    - New addition to the train collection: Featuring Timmy's latest homemade train creation.

    - New Traincade Game: Oh yes the Train-themed arcade games continue. Go hunting for the new game's disc!

    Update now to experience these exciting new features and continue your journey in Teeny Tiny Trains!

Share This Page
